actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a deduction from gross income for the donation of blood.
short_title: Relief for Life-Saving Blood Donors Act of 2004

summary.text: Relief for Life-Saving Blood Donors Act of 2004 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a tax deduction from gross income (available for taxpayers whether or not they itemize deductions) for the donation of blood and plasma to a recognized blood bank center or blood-collection institution.. Allows $50 for each donation to a maximum of $150 for a taxable year.

titles.title: Relief for Life-Saving Blood Donors Act of 2004
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a deduction from gross income for the donation of blood.
